title: Brisbane: city in the sun
creator_credit: Hugh McInnes, Eric Thompson and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: This film illustrates the pattern of life in Brisbane, Queensland. Aspects such as commerce, tourist appeal and the social pastimes of locals and tourists are depicted. Includes views of the races, the beach and Brisbane River. Camera: Edward Cranstone Sound: Donald Kennedy Music: Don Andrews
creator_credit_for_label: Hugh McInnes, Eric Thompson and Australian National Film Board
